subject: Problem with vam motor order SSN2484
description_text: Hi, I ordered 3 vam motors and it arrived few days ago. One of the motors started doing loud noises and getting hotter than the others. I think its something wrong with it. Can i have a replacement or something? Thanks in advance

conversations.body_text: Hi Adrià Zayas,    Please provide your order number. We can assist you in disassembling the noisy motor to identify the cause, and then send you a replacement motor.

Hi, my order number is SSN2484
